name: WhenInRome
tagline: My solution to the FCC Bonfire for Roman numerals.
body:
### WhenInRome Decimal to Roman Numeral Converter.
This is my solution to the [FreeCodeCamp Bonfire challenge](http://freecodecamp.com/challenges/bonfire-roman-numeral-converter). Check out @FreeCodeCamp. 

### ToDo
Currently only works for numbers less than 1000. I just need to add a condition for it, but I was so excited I got it working, I just had to push!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
